listitem.para:
PFS group to be used if pfs=yes, e.g. pfsgroup=modp1536
Because PFS group is not negotiated it is single valued and must be previously coordinated with peer. Possible values are: modp1024, modp1536, modp2048, modp3072 and modp4096. If not specified, it will use same DH group of phase1.
Default value is the same value as Phase1's DH group.
